description: This file defines the main application component for a LightningJS-based minimal notes app. It sets up the application layout, including a header and a content area that renders the NotesHome page component. It also includes a hook to log a message when the app is mounted.

classes.name: Application
classes.description: The root LightningJS application component that orchestrates layout and rendering of child components.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Lifecycle hook called when the application is mounted; logs a message indicating readiness.
